tool_description: Assigns time slots to courses based on duration requirements, preferred times, and scheduling constraints while avoiding basic conflicts.

course_ids.description: List of course identifiers to schedule

start_time.description: Earliest class start time in HH:MM format

end_time.description: Latest class end time in HH:MM format

session_duration.description: Default class session duration in minutes

break_buffer.description: Minimum break time between classes in minutes

error_messages: Invalid course IDs: One or more course_ids do not exist in the system.
Invalid term: Provided term is not found in the academic calendar.
Invalid time format: start_time and end_time must be in HH:MM format.
Invalid time range: start_time must be earlier than end_time.
Invalid duration: session_duration must be between 30 and 180 minutes.
Invalid days: preferred_days must contain valid weekday names.
usage: Provide course_ids and term as required parameters. Optionally specify preferred_days, start_time, end_time, session_duration, and break_buffer to customize scheduling constraints.

scheduled_courses.description: List of successfully scheduled course IDs

schedule_conflicts.description: List of courses that could not be scheduled due to conflicts

time_assignments.description: Time slot assignments in 'CourseID: Day HH:MM-HH:MM' format
